name: Fidget Spinner Challenge - fun and relaxing
name_original: Fidget Spinner Challenge - fun and relaxing
description:
lets have fun and play with Fidget Spinner challenge. Fidget spinner helps you focus and relieve tension. just get relax while playing game.

How to Play

- Tap your screen to the fidget
- Match the falling ball color with the color on the fidget
- Multiple fidget stages that you can unlock.
